title: Junior Software Engineer – Full-Stack (E-Commerce)

experience.description: 0–2 years of full-stack web development experience, ideally in e-commerce

responsibilities: Implement web pages using Next.js/React with reusable components
Build secure APIs for product, order, and payment flows
Collaborate with QA to ensure test coverage and reliability
Troubleshoot customer-facing issues and improve site performance
Document technical designs and workflows
requirements: Knowledge of React or Next.js and Node.js
Understanding of databases (SQL or MongoDB)
Familiarity with payment gateways and RESTful APIs is a plus
Strong collaboration and learning mindset
template_text: We are seeking a Junior Full-Stack Engineer to build scalable e-commerce features, APIs, and user-facing components. The ideal candidate is eager to learn, collaborative, and excited about improving site performance.

title: Junior Full-Stack Developer (Fresher-Friendly)

experience.description: Entry-level, suitable for fresh graduates with exposure to web technologies

responsibilities: Assist in developing front-end interfaces using React and TailwindCSS
Support back-end service development in Node.js and integrate APIs
Contribute to documentation, testing, and DevOps workflows
Learn best practices in code versioning, testing, and agile delivery
Bring fresh ideas to improve usability and developer productivity
requirements: Passion for building products and eagerness to learn
Some exposure to web technologies through college projects or bootcamps
Basic understanding of Git, REST APIs, and databases
Good problem-solving and communication skills
template_text: We welcome fresh graduates to join as Junior Full-Stack Developers. You’ll contribute to front-end and back-end development, testing, and DevOps, while learning best practices in a collaborative startup environment.

title: Junior Software Engineer – Full-Stack (Financial Services)

experience.description: 0–2 years of experience in full-stack development, ideally in financial services or startups

responsibilities: Develop secure web interfaces and reusable UI components
Build REST and GraphQL APIs with Node.js and integrate with cloud data sources
Collaborate with QA to write testable and robust code
Monitor and troubleshoot production systems
Participate in design discussions and product demos
requirements: Knowledge of React/Next.js and server-side development with Node.js/Express
Understanding of database fundamentals (SQL, indexing, transactions)
Basic awareness of security and compliance for handling sensitive data
Enthusiastic about working in a fast-paced startup environment
template_text: We are hiring a Junior Full-Stack Engineer to modernize financial services with secure interfaces, APIs, and cloud-integrated systems. Ideal candidates are enthusiastic about startups and eager to grow their full-stack expertise.

title: Full-Stack Engineer (Entry Level)

experience.description: Entry-level role for freshers or candidates with internships/personal projects

responsibilities: Design, build, and maintain features in React and Node.js with mentorship
Write clean, maintainable, and well-documented code
Participate in code reviews, sprint planning, and team stand-ups
Learn cloud platforms (AWS/Azure/GCP) and DevOps practices
Contribute to building a strong engineering culture
requirements: Some exposure to full-stack projects via coursework, internships, or personal projects
Proficiency in JavaScript/TypeScript; Python or Go is a plus
Familiarity with Git and REST APIs
Strong communication skills and ability to work remotely
template_text: We are hiring an Entry-Level Full-Stack Engineer to deliver real features with React and Node.js. This role emphasizes mentorship, cloud learning, and collaboration in a distributed team.

title: Junior Full-Stack Developer

experience.description: 0–2 years of experience in full-stack web development, SaaS applications preferred

responsibilities: Implement user interfaces with React and responsive design
Build RESTful APIs and microservices with Node.js and Express
Integrate APIs and third-party services into the application
Write automated tests and contribute to CI/CD pipelines
Troubleshoot issues, optimize performance, and ensure security compliance
requirements: Proficiency in JavaScript/TypeScript, HTML, CSS
Hands-on experience with React or Angular and Node.js
Understanding of relational (PostgreSQL/MySQL) or NoSQL databases
Familiarity with Git and agile development workflows
Good problem-solving skills and teamwork mindset
template_text: We are looking for a Junior Full-Stack Developer to contribute to scalable SaaS applications. You will work with React, Node.js, and databases while learning modern development and DevOps practices.

title: Junior Full-Stack Software Engineer

experience.description: 0–2 years of experience in full-stack development or strong project/internship experience

responsibilities: Develop, test, and deploy front-end and back-end components
Collaborate with product designers and senior engineers to ship new features
Maintain code quality and follow best practices (reviews, testing, CI/CD)
Debug issues and support production systems
Learn quickly and contribute to improving development processes
requirements: Bachelor’s degree in Computer Science or related field (or equivalent experience/projects)
Strong understanding of JavaScript/TypeScript, HTML5, CSS3
Familiarity with React, Angular, or Vue
Basic experience with Node.js, Express, REST APIs, and SQL/NoSQL databases
Knowledge of Git and command-line tools
Eagerness to learn and grow in a collaborative environment
template_text: We are hiring a Junior Full-Stack Software Engineer to build features, debug systems, and contribute to CI/CD workflows. The role is ideal for motivated individuals eager to learn modern full-stack practices.

title: Junior Full-Stack Engineer – Gaming / Interactive Apps

experience.description: 0–2 years of experience in full-stack or gaming development projects

responsibilities: Develop interactive UIs with React and WebGL libraries
Build APIs for player profiles, leaderboards, and matchmaking
Optimize app performance for real-time multiplayer experiences
Collaborate with game designers and testers to enhance gameplay
Learn about game engine integrations and cloud scalability

Exposure to Node.js and REST APIs
Interest in gaming technologies and performance optimization
Strong problem-solving and teamwork mindset
template_text: We are looking for a Junior Full-Stack Engineer passionate about gaming. You’ll build UIs, APIs, and real-time features for multiplayer platforms while learning about scalability and engine integrations.

title: Junior Full-Stack Developer – Cybersecurity Product

required: Bachelor's in Computer Science, IT, or related field

experience.description: 0–2 years of full-stack software development experience

responsibilities: Develop responsive UIs for video and media consumption

You will work with React, Node.js, and cloud hosting platforms to build video streaming and content delivery features while collaborating closely with designers and QA. This role is ideal for candidates eager to learn performance optimization and media technologies.
